1.content:
The Expansion Virus, originally known as the E-Formula, was created by the corrupt, power hungry Shadow-Tech corporation in the early 21st century. The Virus was originally designed for the military to improve the strength and size of an armies soldiers. However, the Virus was unstable, and would increase a person's body size in huge and unpredictable ways.

Following an accident at the underground facility where the formula was created, the Virus was released into the outside world and went on to infect millions. In a matter of weeks, most of the world had succumbed to the effect of the Virus and civilisations crumbles into chaos.

Three hundred years later...

Following the outbreak of the virus in 2010, the world descended into anarchy. Years later, Shadow-Tech, the secretive corporation behind the creation of the Virus, managed to seize power and began to find ways to control the Virus. They steered humanity's destiny towards the stars, developing technology to allow mankind to travel at the speed of light and explore the galaxy in pursuit of new worlds.

Although weakened by the Virus, the planet Earth, under Shadow-Tech's control, formed a mighty empire which began to explore the galaxy, encountering alien races, new worlds and new opportunities. But still, the Virus remained and it's legacy lived on...

Though they claim to only act in humanity's best interests, Shadow-Tech continue to look for ways to use the Virus to accelerate genetic engineering and improve their empire. To this end, they have set up laboratories around the galaxy, continuing their immoral experiments.

Characters:

Grace: A former agent of Shadow-Tech, who stole company secrets and went on the run after the company put a price on her head. A very moral person, Grace betrayed Shadow-Tech after she found evidence of their many illegal activities. Grace is a stunning, 24 year old blonde, who, now that she is on the run, is looking for ways to stay two steps ahead of her former employers.

Brooke: A sassy, 26 year old con-woman who possesses her own spaceship and can often be found in the outer colonies, making shady deals with criminals and pirates. The raven haired Brooke often uses her beautiful appearance to wrap men around her little finger before stealing all their money. Brooke has a kind heart, but she is a woman you do not want to cross.

Krysta: Krysta is from an alien species called the Vizians, who inhabit the paradise like world of Vizia. The Vizians are identical to human beings, apart from their blue skin and pointed, elf like ears. Vizia is one of the worlds where Shadow-Tech have been conducting their evil experiments. The Vizians are a peaceful race who are seen as primitive due to their lack of modern technology and space travel. Krysta is 20 years of age and has a cunning mind, she wants nothing more than to see Shadow-Tech removed from her planet.

Lieutenant Karlie Fairbourne: An Earth soldier, commanding an all female squad of marines. Karlie is young, but experienced. Her girlish good looks often cause others to underestimate her abilities, but she is capable of kicking a large amount of ass. A busty red head, aged 23 years old.

Eliza: Eliza is a mysterious girl who remembers very little of her past. She was experimented upon by Shadow Tech at a young age, but escaped from one of their labs at the age of 19. She has been infected with the Virus since a young age, but looks perfectly normal. Genetically engineered to be one of the most beautiful females in existence, Eliza was also given strange powers which allow her to become one with the Virus, which she has lived with her entire life. Using only her mind, she is able to control her transformations and expand her body in any way she wishes.

Jake Stewart: Jake Stewart works for Shadow-Tech as a special agent. He is currently tasked with keeping the company's projects secret. Jake was infected with the Virus in his teenage years, but thanks to expensive Shadow Tech technology, he is able to hold off the effects of the Virus with regular doses of a secret formula which allow him to stay normal. Jake hates Shadow-Tech and only continues to work for them to save himself from succumbing to the effects of the Virus. 24 years old, good looking and with a body considered "perfect" by many women, Jake has become terrified of losing his good looks.
1.title: The Future

choices: Grace decides to meet her mysterious contact...
Grace decides to meet the woman about getting passage aboard a transport...
Grace decides to stay hidden for the moment...
Grace starts to feel very strange, and stays in bed...
Grace is disturbed by a knock at the door...
11.content:
Grace Meadows, formerly of Shadow-Tech Inc, tossed and turned beneath her bedsheets as rain poured down outside, hammering constantly against her window sill. She hadn't been sleeping well lately. It had been one month since Grace stole company secrets from her former employers, Shadow-Tech, and she was now a wanted woman.

It had never been Grace's ambition to uncover any kind of seedy conspiracy at the company. While rumours of Shadow-Tech's illegal operations had persisted for years, Grace had never really paid much attention to them; she was thrilled to get a job with the company, and after being moved to the special projects division after her first six months there, it seemed as she had a bright future with them.

As her time in the special projects division continued, Grace had begun to grow more and more curious about her employer's shady activities. Eventually, Grace stole one of her colleague's security cards and used it to access the company's restricted section. What Grace discovered in the restriction section had shocked her to her very core. Shadow-Tech, the seemingly benevolent saviour of humanity, was conducting illegal experiments, vicious hostile takeovers and had, in fact, been responsible for the outbreak of the expansion virus hundreds of years ago.

Acting quickly, Grace made a copy of the information, but was forced to flee after being discovered by security guards. Her trangression was quickly reported to her superiors, who not only terminated her contract, but made her a wanted fugitive.

Grace grumbled as she tried to get to sleep. Since beginning her life on the run, she had left her home and moved into the city, where it was much easier to blend in. She was currently staying in the vast Metropolis that was San Francisco, one of the most build up cities on Earth. Looking for her here would be like searching for a needle in a haystack.

At the moment, Grace was staying in an apartment deep in the city. It wasn't the fanciest place in the world, but it had been safe so far. Though it had been her intention to leave Earth and start a new life somewhere in the outer colonies, her wanted status prevented her from using any registered transports to escape the planet. She was effectively trapped on Earth.

Grace had, however, considered her options and started making plans to escape. She had spoken to a woman about getting transport on an unregistered ship which would take her away from Earth and she had been speaking to a mysterious contact who was interested in acquiring the files she had stolen. Grace had to decide what she wanted to do next...
11.title: Grace

choices: Shadow Tech agents have found her
111.content:
Grace eventually managed to get to sleep, dozing for several hours, finally coming out of her slumber at around 10:30am the next day. As she awoke, she remembered the message her mysterious contact had given her on the phone the previous afternoon... "If you're still interested in 'comparing notes', meet me at the old 22nd St. station at noon tomorrow. I will only wait for 20 minutes. Ciao". Whilst Grace knew that the files she had stolen incriminated Shadow Tech, there were still some elements of the information that she didn't fully understand. She decided that even if she didn't sell the data to this contact, maybe they would be able to shed more light on it for her.

Grace showered, dressed and made her way out of her apartment. If she was to get to the station on time she'd need to take the surf-bus, called so because it only travels on the roads on the surface of the city. She didn't have a car at present as Shadow Tech could use car registration to easily track and trace people.

Grace arrived at the station at almost exactly 12 noon. She began scanning the area for anyone who might be her contact. It then hit her that she didn't even know what her contact looked like. Giving up on looking for her mystery contact, she decided to wait and hope that this person would present themselves to her.

To Grace it felt like an age, in reality she had been waiting for about 15 minutes. "Where the hell are you?" she muttered to herself. She was just about to give up and return to her apartment when someone came up behind her and whispered in her ear. "Pssst".
111.title: Grace decides to meet her mysterious contact...

1112.content:
Grace spun around and came face to face with the reflective Visor of a Shadow Tech trooper's armour. Shit. She tried to make a beeline for the station barriers, but another two troopers blocked her path. Even if she had been armed, she wouldn't have been able to take down the soldiers. Shadow Tech troopers had expert combat training, and, as she had discovered from the files, used extracts of the virus to increase their physical prowess.

"Take her back," the lead trooper said, his voice electronically distorted through his mask.

The troopers grabbed hold of Grace and hauled her towards a Shadow Tech hovercraft that was waiting outside. A few civilians glanced over and saw her being manhandled by the guards, but quickly looked away. Nobody opposed Shadow Tech. The troopers pulled open the hovercraft doors and threw her inside. Grace hit the floor with a thud, only to have the lead trooper pull her back onto her feet and sit her down.

"That wasn't much of an escape attempt," the lead trooper said, pressing a button on his collar which caused his visor to recede into his armour, revealing a scarred, brutal face.

"Took you long enough to find me though," Grace bit back.

The scarred man chuckled at that. "I suppose so. You know who I am?"

Grace shook her head.

"Agent Wessex, head of Shadow Tech security."

Grace had often heard the name, and knew Wessex by reputation. The Director's right hand man, and by all accounts, a formidable figure in the Shadow Tech hierarchy.

Wessex reached into a pocket on his armoured suit and produced a small holographic projector. He pressed a button, and a small, crystal clear image of a hooded man, seated in a wheelchair sprang up in front of Grace's face.

"Ahhh, our wayward employee," the man in the wheelchair said calmly. "My commendations, Mr. Wessex. As always."

The man's face was entirely covered in shadow, but Grace could see the faint outline of a suit beneath the hooded robe draped over his shoulders. This, she knew, was the Director. The head of Shadow Tech. Rumours had abounded of the Director's status; he was never seen in public and communicated only through intermediaries such a Wessex, but everyone was terrified of him. Seeing him for the first (or what little of him she could see), Grace did not find him especially imposing.

"Have you begun the interrogation?" The Director's asked.

"Not yet, sir," Wessex replied. "I thought you might want to talk to her yourself in case anything...unpleasant happened during the course of our interrogation."

Grace winced, trying to put on a brave face and hide her rising fear. "I don't regret what I did," she said, voice shaking ever so slightly.

The figure leaned forward slightly, causing the hologram to flicker. "You will." He turned his attention back to Wessex. "Find out what she knows. Keep her alive if possible."

"Yes sir," Wessex nodded and the hologram flickered and faded away.

The hovercraft's engine began to start up, and one of the trooper's moved to close the doors...
1112.title: Shadow Tech agents have found her

114.content: Grace's head started to pulse. She felt as though a mighty pulse was trying to push it's way from her body." What is happening to me, she started to think, I feel disoriented". Stumbling towards the tiny bed in her loft, she waited. Feeling hot and cold at the same time. Feeling it affect her body."Oh no", Grace thought to herself, these were what Shadow-Tech covered in her handbook. The first effect of the Virus. "But when was I infected', Grace thought to herself. It didn't matter now however, the Virus was already to far in her system. Its affects were already manifesting.

Grace manages to get out before she is captured, she is still swelling

1141.content:
"Noooooo!" Grace moaned alone in her small apartment. Somehow, someway, Shadowtech managed to nip her with the virus. Grace huffed and puffed in response to the feeling of pure pleasure and pain she was in. When she was one of Shadowtech's goons, she read up on everything the virus did to someone,

It was a combination of mind, and body, change. Infected had been known to turn into bimbos wanting to hump everything they saw; aggressive stalkers looking for a new victim;cows that couldn't even raise a fist in response to danger; and a few more that Grace couldn't think of at the moment. She tumbled off her bed and squeezed her fists to combat the feeling that coursed through her. A little bit of drool fell from her lips onto the floor,her tongue flapped out of her mouth. One thought came to her mind while she released moans of pleasure. She read that the infected could retain their intelligence , without them wanting to infect others. Still, Grace knew that if that were the case, she would still probably be sold off.

When the virus raged through the land, Shadowtech came in to stop its effects. The business was fortunate enough that it accomplished that goal and made a deal with the more intelligent expanded. The two groups made a deal, which resulted in the infected going to a island habitation to live off the rest of their days. Unfortunate, however, were the infected that were too far gone to receive that message or couldn't make it in time. Those ones were used as living investment, being sold as slaves, pets, or perverted helpers. Not sex slaves, surprisingly, most likely do to the fact the virus would most likely infect the idiot who thought that was a good idea. And Grace knew that those options would soon be her fate after the virus made its way through her.

A stronger feeling of pleasure coursed its way through her, which alerted Grace back to the present. Somewhere in her body, a horrible---and exhilarating---touch of pressure built up in her. Grace's eye widened as she felt this, it meant the change in the body had begun.

What the hell will I get? Will I get an ass the size of a car? Muscles that could crush steel? Lips that would make even a fish laugh in humor? Oh god, please don't make me a blueberry!Grace's thoughts wormed their way through her psyche. She moaned even louder as the pressure built and released!

Instead of going away, it felt like it flowed through her, Grace wondered what would happen next, but that event started to make itself known. Grace nipples stood up and she gasped as she saw her once modest bust grow.

Grace grabbed onto her breasts, feeling as she gained more of it. She cried out in shock, before those turned into cries of pleasure. Her breasts made their way towards soccerball size. all the while poor Grace's mind warped and gained new ideas.

11412.content:
"Holy Shit!" Grace screamed as she saw her soccer ball sized breasts blimp atop her chest. Her mind whirled as the virus wormed its way through her body. She arched her back as incredible pleasure,followed by an equally strong pain, pricked her body.The feeling rose like a waking tiger as it raced from the top of her nipples to the bottom of her groin. Rising higher and higher until a climax!

"Yes!" Grace cried as the effect exploded out of her.It soon subsided, leaving Grace moaning in sweat soaked sheets.The whistleblower laid on her bed,basking in her glow. Soon she pushed herself upwards to steady her breath.

"That...that was amazing!" Grace proclaimed. She stretched to work out kinks in her body, and felt her new found weight pull slightly on her arms. Grace grimaced at the sensation, but was a little thrilled by how big she was.No doubt from the virus taking a part of her brain over.Getting up, Grace began to clean up after herself. She pulled up sheets and blankets and pillows. She didn't want to infect some poor maid as well as her desire not to leave any of her DNA behind.

Taking the soaked material, she slowly folded them--hard due to her immense bust--into smaller shapes. Finding them at the smallest she could possibly get, she took out her vacuum luggage. A amazing piece of technology that could take up to fifty pounds of weight and compress them into something as small as a backpack. And it looked like backpack as well.

"Thank god for my once high paying salary." Grace joked.She stuffed her infected sheets into the thing, she would find a safe way to dispose of them later. After doing that, she went to work disinfecting the rest of her apartment. She took out some disinfectants that would kill the virus and sprayed them around her room. Unfortunately, these same disinfectants didn't cure a victim once they were infected. Which was good because Grace didn't want to be cured..wait, no. She did want to be cured, right?

"I can feel it getting to my head." Grace moaned. Finishing the task, Grace went to the bathroom to wash her face off. Turning on the pipes, she splashed some water onto her face. Wiping off any excess with her hands. Looking into the mirror, Grace wanted to get a better view of her new form.

Scraps of her shirt were still around her shoulder, with her new assets hanging from her chest. Her pants were stained by her juices and sweat. The woman's hair was frazzled and unkempt. She looked like a wreck!

"Damn. I look terri-" Grace's words died in her mouth as her Echo 5 communication device beeped. Running out of her bathroom, Grace hastily put it on to see the problem. Her hidden camera in front of her door revealed two drunken looking men stumbling down her hallway. And Grace was about to turn away if she didn't see the quick flash of a Shadowtech Equalizer. She gasped in shock. Shadowtech found her!

How? That question wasn't important until she escaped from her room.

Running around the room, Grace began to place whatever she could into her Vacuum Luggage. She didn't have much thankfully, as she didn't intend the place to be a long-term residence. Taking all of her clothes, shoes, pants, and valuables. Grace finished her work in less than five minutes.

There was one problem at the moment: her top. She didn't have a shirt that could act as an adequate cover. Grace chewed her lower lip as an answer tried to form in her mind. Thinking quickly, Grace pulled out a towel and wrapped it around her body. It held, but did give Grace an ample cleavage window.

"Hell~ Hey?" A voice called from behind the door. It sounded like one of the drunk men had found her room and were trying to play it off as a misunderstanding. But the woman wasn't having any of that. Opening one of her windows, Grace could see the floor all the way down. Taking a step into the cold night, Grace slowly moved down the fire escape. The cold air touched her nipples causing them to turn into fat pink peaks.

Halfway down, Grace thought she was going to make it, but a familiar aura coursed straight through her.

"Not now!" Grace pleaded. But it wasn't enough. Her breasts slowly began to grow, the strain causing her towel to slowly slip off of her. The former Shadowtech personal picked up her pace as she moved down the metal stairs. Kicking down the ladder, Grace's descent made her assets meet cold steel.

"This sucks."

The woman's feet finally touched the ground, and just in time too, as her boobs had grown so much they blew off her towel. Grace collapsed in the alleyway, doing her best to catch her breath. Wiping her forward, Grace devised her next step of where to go. On the even and steady ground that is.
11412.title: A Grace Escape

choices: The woman who is piloting/ knows how to get aboard the unregistered ship
115.content:
Grace was finally about to get to sleep when there was a sharp rap at the door. Grace stirred and sleepily glanced at her clock, it read 1:18am. "Urgh... Go away", she grumbled. The would-be visitor knocked again, this time much louder. "Alright! Alright!", Grace moaned, pushing herself out of her bed, making her way out of the bedroom and across her modest apartment.... And modest was the right word as it barely consisted of three rooms; the bedroom, next to this was the bathroom and both rooms lead out to a smallish sized kitchen/ living room area.

As Grace reached her apartment door and began to unlock it, she mumbled to herself "This better be worth it". She undid the lock and slowly opened the door, revealing a figure standing outside.....




[Who's at the door?]

12.content:
"Hey baby, where you goin' in such a hurry?"

Brooke rolled her eyes as she stepped out of bed, leaving the ruggedly handsome, but painfully stupid man she had picked up at the spaceport in the cheap motel bed they had hired for the night. He had been an average lover, more eye candy than anything, but it was not his love making abilities Brooke was interested in, but his wallet. While the horny idiot in the bed believed it was his masculine charm that had allowed him to bed Brooke, the raven haired beauty had sought him out after seeing him flash his cash around the bar.

"Come on, come back to bed," the man said.

Brooke ignored him. Rising from the bed, completely naked, she turned her back on the moron in the bed and started to get changed. Brooke had a near perfect body; slim, toned and lightly tanned, with a perky pair of breasts and piercing green eyes. Her dark hair flowed down her back, stopping just below her breasts. She sported a tattoo of a skull on her right arm.

"Oh come onnnnn..."

"This guy doesn't known when to quiet," Brooke thought.

She slipped on her panties, a short skirt and a pair of high heeled leather boots. Grabbing her shirt and bra from the floor, Brooke moved to the other side of the room and crouched down by the opposite side of the bed, her perky breasts still exposed. The naked guy in the bed gave her a grin, and for a moment, she smiled back, looking as though she might be about to reconsider his offer to rejoin him in the bed.

"That's more like it..."

Brooke's smile faded very quickly, and, in an instant, she reached into her shirt pocket and pulled out pair of handcuffs. Before her former lover realised what was happening, Brooke had already handcuffed him to the bed. It took him a moment to realise what had happened, but when he did, he began to desperately struggle against the cuffs.

"Hey! What the hell are you doing?" He blurted out in a panic.

Brooke smirked and pulled herself back, quickly putting on her bra and shirt before she began to rummage through the man's possessions, which had been discarded on the floor early tonight. She grabbed his wallet and flicked through it - much to her delight, there was about 1000 credits worth of notes inside. She quickly pocketed it. Not quite the big score she was hoping for, but it made the night worth while. She was about to discard the wallet when she noticed something else in the back compartment - a small, glass tube filled with a green liquid.

Brooke held the tube up to her eye, peering at it curiously. "What's this?" She asked.

"Don't touch that!" The man stuttered. "It's worth a fortune!"

"Oh really?" Brooke's face lit up, a sultry smile crossing her pouty lips. "What is it?"

"I can't say, they'd kill me..."

Brooke chuckled. "So dramatic. Nevermind, I'll figure it out myself. Thanks for paying for the room."

The man glared at her as she made her way out of the room, grabbing her leather jacket as she exited the door, leaving her poor, humiliated conquest tied to the bed. Not a bad night's work. As she made her way out of the Hotel...
12.title: Brooke

choices: Someone runs into her and the vial breaks
122.content:
" Well, that was a fun night, but this night will even be funnier once I spend this cash!" Brooke smiled to herself, making her way to inner Astarte. Located on a planet similar to Earth, Astarte had the benefit of not killing the local environment when it was being made.The air was clean and it didn't have a lot of people compared to other colonies. With only 500,000 civilians and 2000 tourists coming each week, Astarte wouldn't be anything special if a word wasn't used to describe it. The word to describe Astarte is: prosperity. Brooke and that idiot in the bed came here for three reasons. Well, one of them came here for three reasons.

         One; the colony was the first stepping stone to the "outer reaches". The only place that was 100% away from Shadowtech's thumb. The outer reaches was were the explorers of Earth were heading, a new frontier. It was also were Brooke sold her illicit wares, but even then she didn't have a way to alert everybody to her. Which leads to the second reason why Brooke liked Astarte.

         Two;do to that, Astarte became the center of smuggling,tech base contraband, and other illicit ventures. Making this one of Brooke's favorite area for fencing any of her goods. If she couldn't sell something at the outer reaches, or needed supplies, or even if she didn't know what something was, she came here.

         Three;the place had some amazing places for entertainment, hotels, and scenery. The cheap motel was because all the other places were packed. It was the holiday season and many tourists were coming to visit the outer reaches. The little fling with the guy was unexpected for one of them, Brooke was looking for a dupe. However, even she couldn't precisely plan out which hotel she could get a room at.

         Astarte was built with two "rings", an outer and inner ring. The outer ring was on the ground floor of a plateau; with hundreds of middle class citizens living around in a circle around said plateau. This is where most of the workers lived at and hung around. The ship ports were located south, the mining north and the various tech based industries was here. The local wildlife occasionally met the human settlers and some areas were cultivated for parks.

         The inner ring was were the fun was at. Located on, and inside, the plateau,the inner ring was where the entertainment was. One had to go inside the plateau to reach the top. That isn't even beginning with all the buildings, shops, and nooks and crannies, that the place had inside of it. This was where the backdoor activity was held and the place of Brooke's desire.

         "Hopefully I can get some credits for this vial of glop" Brooke said to herself as she made her way to the entrance of the inner ring.
122.title: Brooke decided to go spend some of her new mone...

Brooke is accosted by someone who seems to know what she's carrying.

124.content:
Brooke held the vial up to the flickering light of the holo-display, turning it this way and that. Even in the weak glow provided by the substandard lighting here on the seedy side of the spaceport, the liquid within sparkled and shone like liquid emerald. She'd never seen anything quite like it.

There were a few possibilities, of which the most likely was that it was worthless. She believed the lummox thought it was valuable, but he was the type who would buy dish soap for fifty credits and ounce if you told him it was some new designer drug.

Then again, it could actually be a drug, legal or otherwise, or something else that might pad out her evening's earning's nicely.

It could even be what he'd seemed to think it was, some kind of secret formula that "they" were willing to kill for. The whole thing sounded a little too stupidly cloak-and-dagger for her taste, but what if? Could be a good way to get very rich. Could also be a good way to get very dead.

Either way, she decided, the first order of business would be identifying the stuff so she could tell whether to put it in a safe deposit box or a garbage can.
Fortunately for Brooke, she "knew a guy" for just about everything. She slipped the vial back into her pocket.

The holo-display flickered and lost focus for a minute, then the McDonalds' ad -- a slowly rotating close-up of the new McPlankton, four feet in diameter -- disappeared. The motion sensors had finally kicked in enough for the display to realize someone was standing near it, and was futilely searching for public information on her to base an ad on--not that it would find much. It must have given up, because it tossed up the generic Young Woman Ad: diet supplements.

"Do you want to do this," said the slim, spandex-clad girl in the ad, grinning brilliantly. She held up a cheesecake which must have weighed ten pounds and flopped face-first into it, "--without doing this?"

There was a rumble, and suddenly the girl ballooned up to twice her former size. She looked worried for a second, then smiled again and popped a handful of red-orange pills into her mouth, shrinking back to normal almost at once.

"Body Furnace Plus!" she said triumphantly, holding up a medicine bottle. "Another fine Shadow-Tech product! Because you deserve to be thin. TM"

Brooke smirked wryly, putting a hand on her flat stomach. She was all natural--she'd never used either Body Furnace or Body Furnace Plus. Waste of money to blow a week's pay on taking off ten pounds when you could just keep fit in the first place.

Still, she decided, she did like cheesecake. Especially the real, rich, imported-from-Earth kind you could feel your pants getting tighter just looking at. Maybe if whatever she'd found was the real deal, she'd get herself a little treat.

Hey, if it's the really real deal, and I can unload it without get shot, I'll be able to retire and live on the stuff.

She chuckled, imagining herself as a blimp in Roman robes, licking crumbs from her plump lips as servant boys fanned her.

Heh. Like she would ever really let herself go that much. She, get fat?

What a ridiculous thought!
124.title: Brooke decides to investigate the green liquid ...

choices: She went back to her ship for a change of clothes
She decides to find the man she had just left and decided to have fun with him
125.content:
As her boot heels clacked on the pavement outside the hotel Brooke suddenly began to feel really strange, really dizzy, she struggled to stay standing up, she staggered along a little. A few people walking along in the early morning air looked at her as if to say she had a good night, she looked the part in her sexy retro 21st century clothing, a variation on the skin tight bodysuits that was the usual day wear at that point in the 24th century. Then.....blackness.......

Some seconds later she came to....and she had the shock of her life.....

She was standing up and had held onto something to keep her balance..........but where was she, everything seemed so open, she thought there were buildings the other side of the street but it was open daylight......then she looked around.

"What the f**k!", she exclaimed, the buildings were there but were scarcely up to her knees. her boots had dug into the roadway with cracks fanning out and her right hand was buried in the roof of the building next door to the hotel, masonry crumbling around her fingers as she had gripped the structure, and there was pandemonium and panic at her feet, which to everybody else but Brooke was a looooong way down.

Extracting her beautifully manicured hand from the debris, she did a quick check, her soft skin, the red fingernails, the rings on several of her fingers, all present and correct, no damage, and stroking her long raven coloured locks she contemplated her situation. How did she get like this, a 200ft goddess? Well she certainly felt like one as a wave of euphoria suddenly hit her.....hands on slim hips she took a deep breath.

"Ooooooh, s**t!"

She had glanced down at herself and noticed a green stain on her shirt and the inside pocket lining of her leather jacket. She looked into the pocket and saw the container she had taken from the man she had spent the time with, broken. It must have broken when she had put the jacket on in a hurry and accidentally hit a pillar in the hotel reception as she did so.

"F**k I need to go and get changed now!", she said with annoyance, and started walking....CRUNCH! CRUNCH!..."what the hell was that?".
She had stepped on several road vehicles. "Ooops!", she giggled, her countenance changing, "I forgot I was big"...and the small people scurrying around did look rather funny.........

Her eyes lit up, "this is really kind of cool.......this could be good fun....."

choices: Turn Krysta into a muscle amazon
13.content:
Vizia was a world rich in plant life and highly poor in most metals and minerals. From the tropics to the poles the world was covered in dense forests interspersed by some isolated planes near the coasts.

Vizia was far away from most of the commercial FLT lanes and the neighboring planets in the solar system didn't offer much in the way of minerals or life. Even the star system's asteroid belt and comet cloud were resource poor and not worth the efforts of most commercial entities to harvest.

The result was that Shadow Tech needed to ship most of personell and mercenaries from out of system at great cost.

What the planet did offer however was a remote testing site for many of their more volatile and experimental endeavors. In order to control the markets they needed to control the expansion virus and it multiple every growing list of sub-secies. To control the expansion virus a variety of ultra-pure chemicals were required and they needed to be rigorously tested . Even the possability of stabilizing and harnessing the expansion virus's mutative properties

That was proving to be a problem for the native Vizians.

The troup of the comely elfin aliens took in the site of a crater the size of the Tunguska incident; the result of a laboratory test gone wrong. One Shadow Tech employee hadn't turned a single screw tight enough on a minor apparatus and that was enough to make the whole thing blow.

Krysta bit her lip to avoid supressing her emotions, her nude blue body gleaming in the light.

Behind the all female warband, a priestsess of blood stood. "So you see what you need to do." said the old but still sexually attractive woman.

Krysta and her sisters all nodded, "We know and feel, honored mother." came the reply in unison.

The shaman set herself down, her old bones hardly able to make the journey from the tropical land to the land of conifers.

The shaman straightened, her necklances and trinkets clinking. She turned her gaze to the sky, "Earth mother, we call on you to change the life threads of our sisters to better defend our home."

The women bowed, their supple, feline bodies flexing into surrender poses. "Thank you and forgive us," they chanted.

The shaman's skin from the elbows down turned translucent as her body began to prepare antibodies that would rewrite each girls' DNA in a kind of convergent evolution to the earth born expansion virus. In the past such powers were mostly used to survive plagues or famines, minor alternations or to shake up the DNA for more diversity.

Now drastic and forbidden measures were requires.

The shaman looked directly at Krysta. "What shall it be, my daughter?"
13.title: Krysta

choices: She became a large breasted woman.
134.content:
"Shaman, I would like to receive something other than what you have offered me" Krysta said from her position on the stone. The Shaman looked down at her daughter, wondering why anyone would pick from the less useful expansions.

"Krysta,my darling, why would you choose something different than those? They don't have anything for us!' The Shaman looked down at her daughter to try to get her to understand.

"I know Shaman, but there has to be something that the virus has hidden in those modes. I would like to be the first to discover them, besides," Krysta slyly looked to her mother,"Yulia already chose the giant, Inya chose the muscled brute, and Tyna is a mass of fat. Shouldn't more specialization be permitted?"

The Shaman breathed outwards, kid these days and their care for their looks than brains. "Very well, what would you choose my daughter?"
134.title: Krysta's Choice

151.content: Would Eliza be a good choice or someone else?
151.title: Eliza

choices: Eliza sees something she doesn't like and jumps out.
Another of Renauld's crew comes forth to check on him.
1511.content:
"I'm getting the crate into the ship, don't rush me!" Renauld exclaimed into his communicator. The man in overalls sighed from exertion as he carried over to his hover-trolley. He wiped the top of his head as he accomplished the task, the dryness in his mouth caused him to unconsciously lick.

"Damn. Why was this one so heavy? I mean the others weren't lightweight, but this-" Renauld mumbled on as he pushed his package towards the ship. He passed by the port's various other crates. He stretched his back a little to get out all the kinks. Around him the bustle of motion played out as men rushed back and forth to their own ships. It was the start of the 'Second Migration Fleet', a Shadowtech sponsored foray into a new supercluster of planets. New colonies had already been set up to act as gateways into this unknown region of space. Anyone who was anyone were doing their best to stock up or capitalize on this new opportunity.

Renauld's crew as one of these new explorers,sort of. His crew were more or less selling for the colonists than taking action for themselves. Who sold the shovels was getting more than the one digging, for every big winner was nine other losers. Merchants as they thought of themselves, they were planning on selling everything under the sun. And hopefully they could also get to their destination before the other entrepreneurs could do this as well.

"All right, so I swear this crate's heavier than the other." Renauld thought as he continued to push. "Wait, don't tell me."


On a hunch Renauld pushed his trolley into a crate alley. He placed a glove his hand and swiped it over the crate. Instantly a blue dot appeared and Renauld pressed down onto it.

"Voice Recognition Required."

"Renuald."

"Access Granted."

Renauld watched as the crate jiggled for a moment until it's top popped open. His eyes slowly peered into the interior of the crate. There he saw a young woman, bald head shinning in his sight,watching a video on a Interax II. She blinked for a moment until she looked up.

"Howdy." Renauld spoke.Yep, another stowaway,he should've have known.This was how he met his crew's future navigator in the first place. The woman's eyes bugled comically in her head, like, literally bugled. Like they swelled in there sockets.

"Okay this is new." Renauld thought as he watched the youth's eye slowly deflate.
1511.title: Eliza

choices: Shadowtech employees watch from the distance
15111.content:
"Uhh." Renauld stated as her saw the young lady come up from the crate. She wore a tight purple spandex with a symbol quite familar for the man. Shadowtech's distinct insignia right above her breasts, if she had any at least. She smiled as she held her hand open for a shake, which Renauld didn't take up.

"Hi." She spoke. "I'm Eliza, nice to meet you."

"Hi." Renauld replied. "Nice to meet you too."

Eliza stretched while Renauld watched. She gave a few mock stretches before she finished her deed. Eliza gave another smile while Renauld stared dumbfounded. She peered at him quizzically.

"Are you okay?" She questioned. Renauld held a finger up before he quickly lowered it.

"Question." He calmly spoke after a few minutes." What was with the."

Renauld mouthed a word, Eliza didn't seem to catch on though, as she mimicked his same movements. Renauld picked an alternative route of communication, miming the motion of her eyes growing. Eliza didn't seem to catch with this action though as she mimicked him like before. Renauld decided the best way to communicate was through eloquently speaking his concern.

"Your eyes. What was with your eyes?" He spoke.

Eliza's face brightened in realization. "Its a long story, do you have a ship, I can explain when we're on it."

Renauld blinked in realization, his mouth turning into an 'o' of revelation.

"Oh shit. The cargo! What did you do with it?' Renauld spoke.

"I left it back at that warehouse. Why'd you need to know?" Eliza questioned. Renauled moaned out in distress and swiftly paced back towards the building. Eliza looked at his back, shrugged, then followed.
15111.title: Eliza introduces herself.

choices: The duo get out of the warehouse without a hassle.
151111.content:
"Why are you following me?" Renauld calmly spoke back to Eliza as she trailed behind him. The young lady responded with a Gaelic shrug.

"I don't know where else to go." Eliza spoke.

"What's to say that I don't leave your ass here?" Renauld answered.

"Unlike a certain someone, you don't have the added benefit of being on our ship during transit." Renauld mused as he continued to walk. Eliza still trailed behind the man with barely any hesitation in her steps.A few folks stared at the bald woman, but more due to her familiar spandex than her lack of follicles. Some citizens wondered about why a Shadowtech employee was at this station but nothing more than a few whispered conversations came from that.Eventually the two arrived back at the warehouse Renauld had come out of. He swiped a card on the right of the interlocked doors and went inside, Eliza quickly slipping in with him. He stared around for a few moments, until he seemed to have found what he was looking for.

Walking over to the spot Renauld looked down at the device Eliza had taken out of the crate. It was En-Clear pack, a top of the line environmental protection apparatus. A quite expensive gadget and one that the crew hoped to hawk to the colonists. He smiled as held it between his hands until a finger tapped his shoulder.

"Got what you needed?" Eliza spoke with a smile.

"I wouldn't have to get it in the first place if you didn't throw it out of its crate." Renauld said back.

"Hey. The little doo-dad took up way more space than it should have."

""Cause its a delicate piece of equipment." Renauld snapped at Eliza.

"Well it can't be that delicate if you're holding it like that" Eliza pointed out. Renauld frowned but didn't say anything else. Tucking the device his armpit, Renauld began to walk towards the warehouse's doors with Eliza behind him.
151111.title: Eliza tags along with Renauld

152.content:
Jake addressed the pannel of computer screens and rapidly typed away at holographic keys in mid air. His eyes ran from screen to screen in ways literally impossible for a human being to do a few centuries ago.

Exposure to the expansion virus wasn't all bad. A side effect of accidental exposure and years of fine tuning viral-control serums had led to the ability to perform a number of complex mathematical jobs at once for long periods of time without succumbing to boredom or tiredness.

Technically Shadow-Tech were a bunch of scumbags and every year they insisted on cutting his budget, but he always fought them back for it. He needed that budget not only to manage his somewhat extravagent lifestyle but to also maintain his perfect body.

Working from home on a remote district in Mars colony, Jake worked like seven Starcraft players combined in one body but had the actual body of an olympian. Six feet tall, blonde, chiselled and muscular enough to look healthy without looking inhuman many women considered him the perfect man. Viral side effects made his tongue unusually long and prehensile, able to eat pussy and like a god and find even the most difficult clitoris. It was hyper sensitive to touch and pheramones so he knew what a woman was feeling as well as she did.

He wasn't just the perfect man because his twelve inch cock could be as gentle or as brutal as a woman wanted. Or that he had a minor ability to inflate his dick depending on how tight or adventurous a woman was. he would please the most demure virgins or the most jaded size queens.

His duty with Shadow-Tech was to help keep their various operations secret. Even after over a century of research Virus Designation E-1029A was still highly volatile and had unpredictable evolutionary paths. If an experiment got out, or went wrong then the company could lose millions of credits. Or worse in Jake's own opinion, someone could get hurt.

A viral strain programmed to turn women into super soldiers had the unexpected side effect of turning them into horny, expectant mothers who wanted nothing but to fuck. He'd send them off to a prison camp belonging to a reptillian race. The girls wouldn't be happy but he knew for a fact that the reptilian overlords would treat them better than the company's repossession or assassination teams.

Jake stopped and took off his headset, even his abilities had their limits. Stretching, his toned muscles bulged and flexed in the easy light of his private den. His only piece of clothing, a tight speedo bulged with his impressive junk.

He dind't want to think about what would happen if he quit Shadow-Tech and couldn't get access to his serum. But he could never shake how he was ruining people's lives. Sure the girls on the reptilian planet would be alive but he doubted they'd appreciate being sold as prisoners or slaves to two-dicked reptile men.

He had too much to lose, to leave this position. So he kept on.

But he'd been working for nearly eighty hours non stop, it was time for a break.
152.title: Jake

info.brief_description: In the far future, the expansion virus continues to infect!
info.description:
This story is a sequel to my interactive "Expansion Virus". This story, unlike it's predecessor, is set in the year 2300, three centuries after the outbreak of the virus. Unlike the previous story, which was set in modern day, this story is set in the future and will venture more into science fiction.

Anything expansion wise goes: Weight Gain, Giant/Giantess, Muscle Growth, Breast Expansion, Butt Expansion, Blueberry, Belly Expansion, Pregnancy, Inflation and whatever else I might have missed.
